title: Growth Slows For Infrastructure Finance In Nbfcs: Icra Report | Mint - Mint

description: Growth prospects for NBFC-IFCs are strong as demand for infrastructure credit is expected to gather pace amid the governmentâ€™s resolve to focus on the infrastructure sector to revive economic growth. Consequently, NBFC-IFCs loan books are expected to grow by 10-12% in FY2023
